name: Cube (itch) (KolbyBlade)
description:
NOTE DUE TO A UNITY BUG THAT I AM WORKING ON YOU HAVE TO GO FULLSCREEN (HIT THE EXPAND BUTTON AT THE BOTTOM) YOU CAN THEN EXIT FULLSCREEN. I DONT KNOW WHAT IS CAUSING THIS BUT I WILL FIGURE IT OUT.

Cube is a visually pleasing sidescrolling platformer. You play as Cube who got lost deep down in a cave. As you progress through the levels you make it closer and closer to the surface only to discover the reason that cube went into the cave in the first place. Cube is currently a prototype and only has one level and a very crude menu but I hope to expand upon it if feedback is positive!
